    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Music of Blue Danube &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Oct 2, 2015
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/danube

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18627826">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18627826">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18627826">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18627826">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt18627826" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21364710">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21364710">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21364710">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21364710">
          <div id="boxatt21364710" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24867395">
              <a id="link_24867395" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24867395,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music of Blue Danube', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24867309">
              New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Arguably the most authoritative encyclopedia for the study of music. Available in Trexler Library, C level, call # 780.3 N532n.
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/strauss.pdf">
                Sample page
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24870759">
              <a id="link_24870759" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24870759,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music of Blue Danube', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18629875">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18629875">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18629875">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative sources for social, cultural, and historical context
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18629875">
          <div id="boxatt18629875" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24867338">
              <a id="link_24867338" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24867338,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music of Blue Danube', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24867397">
              <a id="link_24867397" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24867397,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music of Blue Danube', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24867400">
              <a id="link_24867400" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24867400,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music of Blue Danube', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24867339">
              <a id="link_24867339" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24867339,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music of Blue Danube', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717593}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly and popular literature in musicology, ethnomusicology, dance, and other music-related disciplines, with many links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24867340">
              <a id="link_24867340" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24867340,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music of Blue Danube', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18630109">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18630109">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18630109">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Music recordings
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18630109">
          <div id="boxatt18630109" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21847423">
              <a id="link_21847423" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search/?searchtype=t&amp;SORT=D&amp;searcharg=naxos+music+library" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21847423,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music of Blue Danube', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21847423}); ">
               Naxos Music Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5019275" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18627833">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18627833">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18627833">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I cite sources in a bibliography?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18627833">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt18627833" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
